description: [Pillowmint](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0517) has been compressed and stored within a registry key. [Pillowmint](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0517) has also obfuscated the AES key used for encryption.(Citation: Trustwave Pillowmint June 2020)
